description: This file defines a React component called ResourceTable that renders an accessible, sortable, and pageable table for displaying resource data. It includes internal state for sorting and pagination, and generates table headers with sorting controls. The component takes resource data and callbacks for pagination as props, and handles sorting logic internally.

methods.name: ResourceTable
methods.description: Main React component rendering the resource table with sorting and pagination.

methods.name: SortableHeader
methods.description: Helper sub-component for sortable table headers with sort buttons.
